official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to determining the amount of payment for certain drugs under the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for physician administered drugs used for treating neoplasms.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to determining the amount of payment for certain drugs under the medicare program.
